name: Min's 3D Ball puzzle
description:
The object of the game is to move the around course to reach each checkpoints on the map. Whenever the ball falls off the map, players are sent back to the "lobby" level and have to restart. The last map however, holds a little surprise and players respawn into the same level even if they fall off because of the difficulty. 

The propellers and falling barriers add extra intensity to the game. The game is also decorated with a halloween theme because we are nearing it.

Edit: Now players spawn to the same level to lower the difficulty of finishing.
